name: lambdas
description: This is a package for Lambdas written in Typescript

scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && pnpm local:bootstrap && pnpm local:deploy && pnpm build:docs && pnpm watch
scripts.local:bootstrap: export STAGE=local && export LAMBDA_MOUNT_CWD=$(pwd)/dist && cdklocal bootstrap
scripts.local:deploy: export STAGE=local && export LAMBDA_MOUNT_CWD=$(pwd)/dist && cdklocal deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.test:integration: docker-compose up -d && pnpm local:bootstrap && pnpm local:deploy && jest -- test/local.integration.test.ts
